column1: Flask app is run in debug mode
column2: Running a Flask app in debug mode may allow an attacker to run arbitrary code through the Werkzeug debugger.
column4: A Flask app appears to be run in debug mode. This may allow an attacker to run arbitrary code through the debugger.
